vw_automated_task_logs.view_query: SELECT automated_tasks.automated_task_name,automated_tasks.automated_task_number,automated_task_logs.* FROM automated_task_logs LEFT JOIN automated_tasks ON automated_task_logs.automated_task_id = automated_tasks.automated_task_id;

vw_budget_accounts.view_query: SELECT accounts.account_name,accounts.account_type,accounts.account_category, budget_accounts.* FROM budget_accounts LEFT JOIN accounts ON budget_accounts.account_id = accounts.account_id

vw_budgets.view_query: SELECT IFNULL(accounts_summary.total_min_amount,0) + IFNULL(account_groups_summary.total_min_amount,0) AS total_min_amount,IFNULL(accounts_summary.total_max_amount,0) + IFNULL(account_groups_summary.total_max_amount,0) AS total_max_amount,IFNULL(accounts_summary.accounts_count,0) AS accounts_count,IFNULL(account_groups_summary.account_groups_count,0) AS account_groups_count,DATEDIFF(budget_end_date, budget_start_date) AS days_count,budgets.* FROM budgets LEFT JOIN (SELECT COUNT(budget_account_id) AS accounts_count,SUM(budget_min_amount) AS total_min_amount,SUM(budget_max_amount) AS total_max_amount,budget_id FROM budget_accounts GROUP BY budget_id) AS accounts_summary ON budgets.budget_id = accounts_summary.budget_id LEFT JOIN (SELECT COUNT(budget_account_group_id) AS account_groups_count,SUM(budget_min_amount) AS total_min_amount,SUM(budget_max_amount) AS total_max_amount,budget_id FROM budget_account_groups GROUP BY budget_id) AS account_groups_summary ON budgets.budget_id = account_groups_summary.budget_id

vw_checklists.view_query: SELECT checklists.checklist_id,checklists.checklist_name,checklists.attachments,checklists.remarks,checklists.checklist_type,IFNULL(completed_counts.completed_count,0) AS completed_checklist_items,(IFNULL(total_counts.total_count,0)-IFNULL(completed_counts.completed_count,0)) AS pending_checklist_items,IFNULL(total_counts.total_count,0) AS total_checklist_items FROM checklists LEFT JOIN (SELECT COUNT(checklist_id) AS completed_count,checklist_item_status,checklist_id FROM checklist_items GROUP BY checklist_item_status,checklist_id HAVING checklist_item_status = 'COMPLETED') AS completed_counts ON checklists.checklist_id = completed_counts.checklist_id LEFT JOIN (SELECT COUNT(checklist_id) AS total_count,checklist_id FROM checklist_items GROUP BY checklist_id) AS total_counts ON checklists.checklist_id = total_counts.checklist_id

vw_coupons.view_query: SELECT (IF(total_count IS NULL,0,total_count)-IF(used_count IS NULL,0,used_count)) AS not_used_count,IF(total_count IS NULL,0,total_count) AS total_count,IF(used_count IS NULL,0,used_count) AS used_count,DATEDIFF(valid_to, valid_from) AS days_count,IF(DATEDIFF(valid_to,NOW()) > 0, DATEDIFF(valid_to,NOW()),0) AS valid_days,coupons.* FROM coupons LEFT JOIN (SELECT COUNT(coupon_id) as total_count,coupon_id FROM coupon_issues GROUP BY coupon_id) AS total_summary ON coupons.coupon_id = total_summary.coupon_id LEFT JOIN (SELECT COUNT(coupon_id) as used_count,coupon_id FROM coupon_issues WHERE coupon_issue_status='USED' GROUP BY coupon_id ) AS used_summary ON coupons.coupon_id = used_summary.coupon_id

vw_currency_rate_updates.view_query: SELECT vw_employees.employee_name,vw_employees.employee_code,currencies.currency_id,currencies.currency_name,currencies.country_name,currency_rate_updates.* FROM currency_rate_updates LEFT JOIN vw_employees ON currency_rate_updates.approved_by = vw_employees.employee_id LEFT JOIN currencies ON currency_rate_updates.currency_code = currencies.currency_code

vw_customer_contracts.view_query: SELECT DATEDIFF(customer_contract_end_date, customer_contract_start_date) AS days_count, IF( DATEDIFF(customer_contract_end_date,NOW()) > 0, DATEDIFF(customer_contract_end_date,NOW()),0) AS valid_days,vw_customers.customer_name,vw_customers.phone_details,vw_customers.phone_values,vw_customers.email_details,vw_customers.email_values,customer_contracts.* FROM customer_contracts LEFT JOIN vw_customers ON customer_contracts.customer_id = vw_customers.customer_id

vw_devices.view_query: SELECT companies.company_name,locations.location_name,users.username,devices.* FROM devices LEFT JOIN companies ON devices.company_id = companies.company_id LEFT JOIN locations ON devices.location_id = locations.location_id LEFT JOIN users ON devices.user_id = users.user_id;

vw_document_expenses.view_query: SELECT IF(document_expenses.document_type = 'purchase_invoices',purchase_invoices.invoice_number,IF(document_expenses.document_type = 'purchase_commercial_invoices', purchase_commercial_invoices.commercial_invoice_number, IF(document_expenses.document_type = 'purchase_packing_lists',purchase_packing_lists.packing_list_number, IF(document_expenses.document_type = 'purchase_containers',purchase_containers.container_number , IF(document_expenses.document_type = 'purchase_proformas',purchase_proformas.proforma_number ,IF(document_expenses.document_type = 'purchase_orders',purchase_orders.order_number,'UNKNOWN' )))))) AS document_number, accounts.account_name,payment_methods.payment_method_name,document_expenses.* FROm document_expenses LEFT JOIN accounts ON document_expenses.expense_account_id = accounts.account_id LEFT JOIN payment_methods ON document_expenses.payment_method_id = payment_methods.payment_method_id LEFT JOIN purchase_orders ON document_expenses.document_id = purchase_orders.order_id AND document_expenses.document_type='purchase_orders' LEFT JOIN purchase_proformas ON document_expenses.document_id = purchase_proformas.proforma_id AND document_expenses.document_type='purchase_proformas' LEFT JOIN purchase_containers ON document_expenses.document_id = purchase_containers.container_id AND document_expenses.document_type='purchase_containers' LEFT JOIN purchase_packing_lists ON document_expenses.document_id = purchase_packing_lists.packing_list_id AND document_expenses.document_type='purchase_packing_lists' LEFT JOIN purchase_commercial_invoices ON document_expenses.document_id = purchase_commercial_invoices.commercial_invoice_id AND document_expenses.document_type='purchase_commercial_invoices' LEFT JOIN purchase_invoices ON document_expenses.document_id = purchase_invoices.invoice_id AND document_expenses.document_type='purchase_invoices'

vw_document_paid_amounts.view_query: SELECT SUM(payment_amount) as paid_amount,document_id,document_type FROM `document_payments` WHERE document_payment_status = 'COMPLETED' GROUP BY document_id,document_type

vw_employee_loan_installments.view_query: SELECT employee_loans.loan_number,employee_loans.employee_id,employee_loan_installments.* FROM employee_loan_installments LEFT JOIN employee_loans ON employee_loan_installments.loan_id = employee_loans.loan_id

vw_employees.view_query: SELECT CONCAT(IF(first_name IS NULL,'',first_name),IF(middle_name IS NULL,'',' '),IF(middle_name IS NULL,'',middle_name),IF(last_name IS NULL,'',' '),IF(last_name IS NULL,'',last_name)) AS employee_name,employees.* FROM employees

vw_inventory_tracking_quantities.view_query: SELECT inventory_trackings.inventory_multiplier,inventory_trackings.contra_table_name,inventory_trackings.contra_record_id,contra_field_name,inventory_trackings.item_id,storage_locations.storage_location_name,storage_locations.storage_location_tree,inventory_tracking_quantities.* FROM inventory_tracking_quantities LEFT JOIN storage_locations ON inventory_tracking_quantities.storage_location_id = storage_locations.storage_location_id LEFT JOIN inventory_trackings ON inventory_tracking_quantities.inventory_tracking_id = inventory_trackings.inventory_tracking_id

vw_item_parts.view_query: SELECT vw_items.item_name,vw_items.category_name,vw_items.barcode_value,vw_items.item_code,vw_items.item_type,vw_items_for_parts.item_name as part_item_name,vw_items_for_parts.category_name AS part_category_name,vw_items_for_parts.barcode_value as part_barcode_value,vw_items_for_parts.item_code as part_item_code,vw_items_for_parts.item_type as part_item_type,item_parts.* FROM item_parts LEFT JOIN vw_items ON item_parts.item_id = vw_items.item_id LEFT JOIN vw_items as vw_items_for_parts ON item_parts.item_id = vw_items_for_parts.item_id

vw_item_price_update_items.view_query: SELECT items.item_name,items.item_code,items.item_price_sale,item_price_updates.item_price_update_name,item_price_updates.item_price_update_number,item_price_updates.item_price_update_reason,item_price_updates.item_price_update_status,item_price_updates.item_price_update_time,item_price_update_items.* FROM item_price_update_items LEFT JOIN item_price_updates ON item_price_update_items.item_price_update_id = item_price_updates.item_price_update_id LEFT JOIN items ON item_price_update_items.item_id = items.item_id

vw_item_stock_quantity.view_query: SELECT item_id,SUM(item_quantity * inventory_multiplier) AS stock_quantity FROM `vw_inventory_tracking_quantities` GROUP BY item_id,location_id

vw_item_stock_quantity_locations.view_query: SELECT item_id,location_id,SUM(item_quantity * inventory_multiplier) AS stock_quantity FROM `vw_inventory_tracking_quantities` GROUP BY item_id,location_id

vw_item_stock_quantity_storage_locations.view_query: SELECT item_id,location_id,storage_location_id,SUM(item_quantity * inventory_multiplier) AS stock_quantity FROM `vw_inventory_tracking_quantities` GROUP BY item_id,location_id,storage_location_id

vw_items.view_query: SELECT item_categories.category_name, item_categories.master_category_id,vendors.vendor_name,items.attachments, items.barcode_value,items.company_id,items.default_vendor_id,items.dimension_purchase,items.dimension_sale, items.hsnsac_code,items.item_code,items.is_saleable,items.item_category_id,items.item_description_full,items.item_description_quick,items.item_id,items.item_images,items.item_name,items.item_short_name,items.item_number,items.item_uoms,items.item_attributes,items.remarks,IFNULL(item_price_mrp,0) AS item_price_mrp,IFNULL(item_price_purchase,0) AS item_price_purchase,IFNULL(item_price_sale,0) AS item_price_sale,item_sku,IFNULL(item_status,'ACTIVE') AS item_status,item_type,IFNULL(item_unit_purchase,'NOS') AS item_unit_purchase,IFNULL(item_unit_sale,'NOS') AS item_unit_sale,IFNULL(item_unit_stock,'NOS') AS item_unit_stock,IFNULL(minimum_stock_quantity,1) AS minimum_stock_quantity,IFNULL(minimum_stock_unit_quantity,1) AS minimum_stock_unit_quantity,IFNULL(minimum_stock_unit,'NOS') AS minimum_stock_unit,IFNULL(maximum_stock_quantity,0) AS maximum_stock_quantity,IFNULL(maximum_stock_unit_quantity,1) AS maximum_stock_unit_quantity,IFNULL(maximum_stock_unit,'NOS') AS maximum_stock_unit,IFNULL(minimum_order_quantity,0) AS minimum_order_quantity,IFNULL(minimum_order_unit_quantity,1) AS minimum_order_unit_quantity,IFNULL(minimum_order_unit,'NOS') AS minimum_order_unit,IFNULL(threshold_stock_quantity,0) AS threshold_stock_quantity,IFNULL(threshold_stock_unit_quantity,1) AS threshold_stock_unit_quantity,IFNULL(threshold_stock_unit,'NOS') AS threshold_stock_unit,warranty_expiration_details FROM items LEFT JOIN item_categories ON items.item_category_id = item_categories.category_id LEFT JOIN vendors ON items.default_vendor_id = vendors.vendor_id

vw_items_in_order.view_query: SELECT SUM(item_quantity) in_order_quantity,item_id FROM (SELECT * FROM purchase_order_items WHERE order_item_status NOT IN ('COMPLETED','CANCELLED')) as items GROUP BY item_id

vw_landing_price_items.view_query: SELECT items.item_name,items.item_number,items.item_price_sale,items.item_code,items.item_uoms,items.barcode_value,items.item_unit_purchase,items.item_unit_sale,items.item_unit_stock,items.item_images,landing_price_items.* FROM landing_price_items LEFT JOIN items ON landing_price_items.item_id = items.item_id

vw_last_vendor_order_item_prices.view_query: SELECT t.vendor_id,t.item_id,t.order_id,t.order_number,t.item_price FROM (SELECT po.vendor_id,poi.item_id,poi.order_id,po.order_number,poi.item_price,ROW_NUMBER() OVER (PARTITION BY poi.item_id ORDER BY po.order_date DESC, po.order_number DESC) AS rn FROM purchase_order_items poi LEFT JOIN purchase_orders po ON poi.order_id = po.order_id) t WHERE t.rn = 1;

vw_location_item_deliveries.view_query: SELECT items.item_name,items.item_code,items.item_images,items.item_number,items.item_uoms,vw_material_requests.material_request_number,vw_material_requests.employee_name,location_item_deliveries.*,vw_sale_invoice_items.sale_invoice_number FROM `location_item_deliveries` LEFT JOIN items ON location_item_deliveries.item_id = items.item_id LEFT JOIN vw_material_requests ON location_item_deliveries.location_item_delivery_id = vw_material_requests.location_item_delivery_id LEFT JOIN vw_sale_invoice_items ON location_item_deliveries.location_item_delivery_id = vw_sale_invoice_items.location_item_delivery_id

vw_location_item_delivery_storage_locati.view_query: SELECT storage_locations.storage_location_name,storage_locations.storage_location_tree,vw_location_item_deliveries.item_code,vw_location_item_deliveries.item_images,vw_location_item_deliveries.item_name,location_item_delivery_storage_locations.* FROM location_item_delivery_storage_locations LEFT JOIN vw_location_item_deliveries ON location_item_delivery_storage_locations.location_item_delivery_id = vw_location_item_deliveries.location_item_delivery_id LEFT JOIN storage_locations ON location_item_delivery_storage_locations.storage_location_id = storage_locations.storage_location_id

vw_location_item_receipt_storage_locatio.view_query: SELECT storage_locations.storage_location_name,storage_locations.storage_location_tree,vw_location_item_receipts.item_code,vw_location_item_receipts.item_images,vw_location_item_receipts.item_name,location_item_receipt_storage_locations.* FROM location_item_receipt_storage_locations LEFT JOIN vw_location_item_receipts ON location_item_receipt_storage_locations.location_item_receipt_id = vw_location_item_receipts.location_item_receipt_id LEFT JOIN storage_locations ON location_item_receipt_storage_locations.storage_location_id = storage_locations.storage_location_id

vw_location_item_receipts.view_query: SELECT items.item_name,items.item_code,items.item_images,items.item_number,items.item_uoms,location_item_receipts.*,vw_purchase_invoice_items.invoice_number FROM `location_item_receipts` LEFT JOIN items ON location_item_receipts.item_id = items.item_id LEFT JOIN vw_purchase_invoice_items ON location_item_receipts.location_item_receipt_id = vw_purchase_invoice_items.location_item_receipt_id

vw_locations.view_query: SELECT companies.company_name, locations.* FROM locations LEFT JOIN companies ON locations.company_id = companies.company_id

vw_material_requests.view_query: SELECT pickup_location.location_name as pickup_location_name,items.item_name,items.item_name as item_description ,items.item_images,vw_employees.employee_name,vw_employees.phone_values,material_requests.* FROM material_requests LEFT JOIN items ON material_requests.item_id = items.item_id LEFT JOIN vw_employees ON material_requests.employee_id = vw_employees.employee_id LEFT JOIN locations as pickup_location ON material_requests.pickup_location_id = pickup_location.location_id

vw_membership_cards.view_query: SELECT membership_cards.*, vw_customers.phone_values, vw_customers.email_values, vw_customers.customer_name, vw_customers.customer_images, vw_customers.customer_category, pricing_groups.pricing_group_name, payment_methods.payment_method_name FROM membership_cards LEFT JOIN vw_customers ON membership_cards.customer_id = vw_customers.customer_id LEFT JOIN pricing_groups ON membership_cards.pricing_group_id = pricing_groups.pricing_group_id LEFT JOIN payment_methods ON payment_methods.payment_method_id = membership_cards.payment_method_id

vw_mini_projects.view_query: SELECT vw_sale_invoices.sale_invoice_date, vw_sale_invoices.sale_invoice_number ,vw_sale_quotes.sale_quote_date ,vw_sale_quotes.sale_quote_number ,vw_sale_quotes.customer_name as sale_quote_customer_name,vw_sale_quotes.customer_id as sale_quote_customer_id,vw_sale_invoices.customer_name as sale_invoice_customer_name,vw_sale_invoices.customer_id as sale_invoice_customer_id,project_services.project_service_name ,project_services.project_service_number ,mini_projects.* FROM mini_projects LEFT JOIN sale_invoice_items ON mini_projects.sale_invoice_item_id = sale_invoice_items.sale_invoice_item_id LEFT JOIN sale_quote_items ON mini_projects.sale_quote_item_id = sale_quote_items.sale_quote_item_id LEFT JOIN vw_sale_quotes ON sale_quote_items.sale_quote_id = vw_sale_quotes.sale_quote_id LEFT JOIN vw_sale_invoices ON sale_invoice_items.sale_invoice_id = vw_sale_invoices.sale_invoice_id LEFT JOIN project_services ON project_services.project_service_id = mini_projects.project_service_id;

vw_offers.view_query: SELECT offers.*,IF(items_summary.items_count IS NULL,0,items_summary.items_count) AS items_count,DATEDIFF(offer_end_date, offer_start_date) AS days_count FROM offers LEFT JOIN (SELECT COUNT(offer_id) AS items_count,offer_id FROM offer_items GROUP BY offer_id) AS items_summary ON offers.offer_id = items_summary.offer_id

vw_payment_methods.view_query: SELECT accounts.account_name,payment_methods.* FROM payment_methods LEFT JOIN accounts ON payment_methods.account_id = accounts.account_id

vw_pricing_groups.view_query: SELECT IF(items_summary.items_count IS NULL,0,items_summary.items_count) AS items_count,IF(customers_summary.customers_count IS NULL,0,customers_summary.customers_count) AS customers_count,pricing_groups.* FROM pricing_groups LEFT JOIN (SELECT COUNT(pricing_group_id) AS items_count,pricing_group_id FROM pricing_group_items GROUP BY pricing_group_id) AS items_summary ON pricing_groups.pricing_group_id = items_summary.pricing_group_id LEFT JOIN (SELECT COUNT(pricing_group_id) AS customers_count, pricing_group_id FROM customers GROUP BY pricing_group_id) AS customers_summary ON pricing_groups.pricing_group_id = customers_summary.pricing_group_id

vw_project_service_input_values.view_query: SELECT items.item_name, items.item_code, items.item_number, items.item_price_sale,items.item_uoms, items.item_unit_sale,items.item_unit_purchase,items.item_unit_stock ,project_service_input_values.* FROM project_service_input_values LEFT JOIN items ON items.item_id = project_service_input_values.item_id

vw_purchase_commercial_invoice_items.view_query: SELECT purchase_commercial_invoice_items.*,IF(purchase_commercial_invoice_items.item_price IS NULL,0,purchase_commercial_invoice_items.item_price)*IF(purchase_commercial_invoice_items.item_unit_quantity IS NULL,0,purchase_commercial_invoice_items.item_unit_quantity) AS item_amount,items.dimension_purchase,items.item_uoms,items.item_code, purchase_commercial_invoices.commercial_invoice_number FROM purchase_commercial_invoice_items LEFT JOIN items ON purchase_commercial_invoice_items.item_id = items.item_id LEFT JOIN purchase_commercial_invoices ON purchase_commercial_invoice_items.commercial_invoice_id = purchase_commercial_invoices.commercial_invoice_id

vw_purchase_commercial_invoices.view_query: SELECT purchase_commercial_invoices.*, vw_vendors.vendor_name,items_summary.items_count,purchase_terms.purchase_term_name,IF(vw_document_paid_amounts.paid_amount IS NULL,0,vw_document_paid_amounts.paid_amount) AS paid_amount,commercial_invoice_amount - IF(vw_document_paid_amounts.paid_amount IS NULL,0,vw_document_paid_amounts.paid_amount) AS pending_amount  FROM purchase_commercial_invoices LEFT JOIN vw_vendors ON purchase_commercial_invoices.vendor_id=vw_vendors.vendor_id LEFT JOIN (SELECT COUNT(commercial_invoice_id) as items_count,commercial_invoice_id FROM purchase_commercial_invoice_items GROUP BY commercial_invoice_id) AS items_summary ON purchase_commercial_invoices.commercial_invoice_id = items_summary.commercial_invoice_id LEFT JOIN purchase_terms ON purchase_commercial_invoices.purchase_term_id = purchase_terms.purchase_term_id LEFT JOIN vw_document_paid_amounts ON vw_document_paid_amounts.document_id = purchase_commercial_invoices.commercial_invoice_id AND vw_document_paid_amounts.document_type = 'purchase_commercial_invoices'

vw_purchase_commercial_invoices_purchase.view_query: SELECT purchase_commercial_invoices_purchase_invoices_link_items.*, purchase_commercial_invoice_items.commercial_invoice_id, purchase_invoice_items.invoice_id FROM purchase_commercial_invoices_purchase_invoices_link_items LEFT JOIN purchase_commercial_invoice_items ON purchase_commercial_invoices_purchase_invoices_link_items.purchase_commercial_invoice_item_id = purchase_commercial_invoice_items.commercial_invoice_item_id LEFT JOIN purchase_invoice_items ON purchase_commercial_invoices_purchase_invoices_link_items.purchase_invoice_item_id = purchase_invoice_items.invoice_item_id

vw_purchase_container_items.view_query: SELECT purchase_container_items.*,items.dimension_purchase,items.item_uoms,items.item_code,items.item_name,purchase_containers.container_number FROM purchase_container_items LEFT JOIN items ON purchase_container_items.item_id = items.item_id LEFT JOIN purchase_containers ON purchase_container_items.container_id = purchase_containers.container_id

vw_purchase_containers.view_query: SELECT purchase_containers.*,items_summary.items_count,shipping_companies.shipping_company_name,vw_checklists.total_checklist_items ,vw_checklists.pending_checklist_items,vw_checklists.completed_checklist_items,locations.location_name  FROM purchase_containers LEFT JOIN (SELECT COUNT(container_id) as items_count,container_id FROM purchase_container_items GROUP BY container_id) AS items_summary ON purchase_containers.container_id = items_summary.container_id LEFT JOIN shipping_companies ON purchase_containers.shipping_company_id = shipping_companies.shipping_company_id LEFT JOIN vw_checklists ON purchase_containers.checklist_id=vw_checklists.checklist_id LEFT JOIN locations ON purchase_containers.empty_location_id = locations.location_id

vw_stock_audits.view_query: SELECT IF(items_count IS NULL, 0 ,items_count) AS items_count,vw_employees.employee_name,vw_employees.employee_code,locations.location_name,stock_audits.* FROM stock_audits LEFT JOIN vw_employees ON stock_audits.performed_by = vw_employees.employee_id LEFT JOIN locations ON stock_audits.location_id = locations.location_id LEFT JOIN (SELECT COUNT(stock_audit_id) AS items_count,stock_audit_id FROM stock_audit_items) AS items_summary ON stock_audits.stock_audit_id = items_summary.stock_audit_id

vw_stock_company.view_query: SELECT IF(stock_quantity<=threshold_stock_quantity,IF(minimum_order_quantity<(threshold_stock_quantity-stock_quantity),(threshold_stock_quantity-stock_quantity),minimum_order_quantity),0) AS new_order_quantity,IFNULL((threshold_stock_quantity-stock_quantity),0) AS below_threshold_quantity,IFNULL((minimum_stock_quantity-stock_quantity),0) AS below_minimum_quantity,IFNULL((stock_quantity-maximum_stock_quantity),0) AS over_stock_quantity,IFNULL(stock_quantity,0) AS stock_quantity,IFNULL(vw_items_in_order.in_order_quantity,0) AS in_order_quantity,vw_items.* FROM vw_items LEFT JOIN vw_item_stock_quantity ON vw_item_stock_quantity.item_id = vw_items.item_id LEFT JOIN vw_items_in_order ON vw_items.item_id = vw_items_in_order.item_id

vw_stock_location.view_query: SELECT vw_item_stock_quantity_locations.location_id,locations.location_name,IFNULL(vw_item_stock_quantity_locations.stock_quantity,0) AS stock_quantity,vw_items.* FROM vw_items LEFT JOIN vw_item_stock_quantity_locations ON vw_item_stock_quantity_locations.item_id = vw_items.item_id LEFT JOIN locations ON vw_item_stock_quantity_locations.location_id = locations.location_id

vw_stock_storage_location.view_query: SELECT vw_item_stock_quantity_storage_locations.stock_quantity,vw_item_stock_quantity_storage_locations.location_id,vw_storage_locations.storage_location_name,vw_storage_locations.storage_location_tree,vw_storage_locations.location_name,vw_item_stock_quantity_storage_locations.storage_location_id,vw_items.* FROM vw_item_stock_quantity_storage_locations LEFT JOIN vw_items ON vw_item_stock_quantity_storage_locations.item_id = vw_items.item_id LEFT JOIN vw_storage_locations ON vw_item_stock_quantity_storage_locations.storage_location_id = vw_storage_locations.storage_location_id

vw_stock_transfer_items.view_query: SELECT stock_transfer_items.*,items.item_name,items.item_uoms,items.item_unit_stock,items.item_unit_sale,items.item_unit_purchase,items.item_images,items.item_code, stock_transfers.stock_transfer_number FROM stock_transfer_items LEFT JOIN items ON stock_transfer_items.item_id = items.item_id LEFT JOIN stock_transfers ON stock_transfer_items.stock_transfer_id = stock_transfers.stock_transfer_id

vw_stock_transfers.view_query: SELECT IF(items_count IS NULL, 0 ,items_count) AS items_count,dispatch_employee.employee_name AS dispatched_by_employee_name,dispatch_employee.employee_code asdispatched_by_employee_code,receive_employee.employee_name AS received_by_employee_name,receive_employee.employee_code as received_by_employee_code,source_locations.location_name AS source_location_name,destination_locations.location_name AS destination_location_name,stock_transfers.* FROM stock_transfers LEFT JOIN vw_employees as dispatch_employee ON stock_transfers.dispatched_by = dispatch_employee.employee_id LEFT JOIN vw_employees as receive_employee ON stock_transfers.received_by = receive_employee.employee_id LEFT JOIN locations as source_locations ON stock_transfers.source_location_id = source_locations.location_id LEFT JOIN locations AS destination_locations ON stock_transfers.destination_location_id = destination_locations.location_id LEFT JOIN (SELECT COUNT(stock_transfer_id) AS items_count,stock_transfer_id FROM stock_transfer_items) AS items_summary ON stock_transfers.stock_transfer_id = items_summary.stock_transfer_id

vw_stock_update_items.view_query: SELECT stock_update_items.*,items.item_name,items.item_uoms,items.item_unit_stock,items.item_unit_sale,items.item_unit_purchase,items.item_images,items.item_code, stock_updates.stock_update_number FROM stock_update_items LEFT JOIN items ON stock_update_items.item_id = items.item_id LEFT JOIN stock_updates ON stock_update_items.stock_update_id = stock_updates.stock_update_id

vw_stock_updates.view_query: SELECT IF(items_count IS NULL, 0 ,items_count) AS items_count,vw_employees.employee_name,vw_employees.employee_code,locations.location_name,stock_updates.* FROM stock_updates LEFT JOIN vw_employees ON stock_updates.performed_by = vw_employees.employee_id LEFT JOIN locations ON stock_updates.location_id = locations.location_id LEFT JOIN (SELECT COUNT(stock_update_id) AS items_count,stock_update_id FROM stock_update_items) AS items_summary ON stock_updates.stock_update_id = items_summary.stock_update_id

vw_storage_location_items.view_query: SELECT vw_storage_locations.storage_location_name,vw_storage_locations.location_name,vw_storage_locations.storage_location_images,vw_storage_locations.storage_location_tree,vw_storage_locations.storage_location_number,vw_items.item_name,vw_items.item_code,vw_items.category_name,vw_items.barcode_value,vw_items.item_images,vw_items.item_number,vw_items.item_uoms, storage_location_items.* FROM storage_location_items LEFT JOIN vw_storage_locations ON storage_location_items.storage_location_id = vw_storage_locations.storage_location_id LEFT JOIN vw_items ON storage_location_items.item_id  = vw_items.item_id

vw_storage_locations.view_query: SELECT locations.location_name,storage_locations.* FROM storage_locations LEFT JOIN locations ON storage_locations.location_id = locations.location_id

vw_transactions.view_query: SELECT accounts_debit.account_name AS account_debit_name,accounts_credit.account_name AS account_credit_name,transactions.transaction_amount as amount_debit,transactions.transaction_amount as amount_credit,transactions.* FROM transactions LEFT JOIN accounts AS accounts_debit ON transactions.account_debit_id = accounts_debit.account_id LEFT JOIN accounts AS accounts_credit ON transactions.account_credit_id = accounts_credit.account_id

vw_unloading_container_packing_list_item.view_query: SELECT vw_purchase_packing_list_items.packing_list_id, vw_purchase_packing_list_items.packing_list_number, vw_purchase_container_items.item_id, vw_purchase_container_items.container_id, vw_purchase_container_items.item_quantity, vw_purchase_container_items.item_unit, vw_purchase_container_items.attachments as container_attachments, vw_purchase_container_items.container_item_status, vw_purchase_container_items.item_description, vw_purchase_container_items.item_name, vw_purchase_container_items.container_number, purchase_containers_purchase_packing_lists_link_items.* FROM purchase_containers_purchase_packing_lists_link_items LEFT JOIN vw_purchase_container_items ON purchase_containers_purchase_packing_lists_link_items.purchase_container_item_id = vw_purchase_container_items.container_item_id LEFT JOIN vw_purchase_packing_list_items ON purchase_containers_purchase_packing_lists_link_items.purchase_packing_list_item_id = vw_purchase_packing_list_items.packing_list_item_id

vw_user_expenses.view_query: SELECT vw_employees.employee_name,vw_employees.employee_images,vw_employees.employee_number,user_expenses.* FROM user_expenses LEFt JOIN vw_employees ON user_expenses.employee_id = vw_employees.employee_id

vw_user_group_users.view_query: SELECt user_groups.user_group_name,user_groups.user_group_number,user_group_users.* FROM user_group_users LEFT JOIN user_groups ON user_group_users.user_group_id = user_groups.user_group_id

vw_users.view_query: SELECT access_groups.access_group_name,access_groups.access_rights, sidebar_menus.sidebar_menu_name, sidebar_menus.sidebar_menu_json,locations.location_name ,assets.asset_name,vw_employees.*,users.user_id,users.password, users.access_group_id,users.username,users.sidebar_menu_id,users.location_id,users.asset_id FROM users LEFT JOIN vw_employees ON users.employee_id = vw_employees.employee_id LEFT JOIN access_groups ON users.access_group_id = access_groups.access_group_id LEFT JOIN sidebar_menus ON users.sidebar_menu_id = sidebar_menus.sidebar_menu_id LEFT JOIN locations ON users.location_id = locations.location_id LEFT JOIN assets ON users.asset_id = assets.asset_id

vw_vendor_contracts.view_query: SELECT vendors.vendor_name,vendors.vendor_number,vendors.vendor_images,vendors.vendor_category,vendor_contracts.* FROM vendor_contracts LEFT JOIN vendors ON vendor_contracts.vendor_id = vendors.vendor_id

vw_vendor_items.view_query: SELECT vw_items.item_short_name,vw_items.item_name,vw_items.category_name,vw_items.barcode_value,vw_items.item_number,vw_items.item_sku,vw_items.item_status,vw_items.item_type,vendors.vendor_name,vendors.vendor_category,vendor_items.* FROM vendor_items LEFT JOIN vw_items ON vendor_items.item_id = vw_items.item_id LEFT JOIN vendors ON vendor_items.vendor_id = vendors.vendor_id;

vw_vendor_payments_summary.view_query: SELECT *, (total_order_amount+total_proforma_amount+total_commercial_amount+total_invoice_amount) AS total_amount, (total_order_paid_amount+total_proforma_paid_amount+total_commercial_paid_amount+total_invoice_paid_amount) AS total_paid_amount, (total_order_pending_amount+total_proforma_pending_amount+total_commercial_pending_amount+total_invoice_pending_amount) AS total_pending_amount FROM (SELECT vendors.*, IF(total_order_amount IS NULL, 0,total_order_amount) AS total_order_amount, IF(total_order_paid_amount IS NULL, 0,total_order_paid_amount) AS total_order_paid_amount, IF(total_order_pending_amount IS NULL, 0,total_order_pending_amount) AS total_order_pending_amount, IF(orders_count IS NULL, 0,orders_count) AS orders_count, IF(total_proforma_amount IS NULL, 0,total_proforma_amount) AS total_proforma_amount, IF(total_proforma_paid_amount IS NULL, 0,total_proforma_paid_amount) AS total_proforma_paid_amount, IF(total_proforma_pending_amount IS NULL, 0,total_proforma_pending_amount) AS total_proforma_pending_amount, IF(proformas_count IS NULL, 0,proformas_count) AS proformas_count, IF(total_commercial_amount IS NULL, 0,total_commercial_amount) AS total_commercial_amount, IF(total_commercial_paid_amount IS NULL, 0,total_commercial_paid_amount) AS total_commercial_paid_amount, IF(total_commercial_pending_amount IS NULL, 0,total_commercial_pending_amount) AS total_commercial_pending_amount, IF(commercials_count IS NULL, 0,commercials_count) AS commercials_count, IF(total_invoice_amount IS NULL, 0,total_invoice_amount) AS total_invoice_amount, IF(total_invoice_paid_amount IS NULL, 0,total_invoice_paid_amount) AS total_invoice_paid_amount, IF(total_invoice_pending_amount IS NULL, 0,total_invoice_pending_amount) AS total_invoice_pending_amount, IF(invoices_count IS NULL, 0,invoices_count) AS invoices_count FROM vw_vendors as vendors LEFT JOIN vw_vendors_order_payments_summary ON vendors.vendor_id = vw_vendors_order_payments_summary.vendor_id LEFT JOIN vw_vendors_proforma_payments_summary ON vendors.vendor_id = vw_vendors_proforma_payments_summary.vendor_id LEFT JOIN vw_vendors_commercial_payments_summary ON vendors.vendor_id = vw_vendors_commercial_payments_summary.vendor_id LEFT JOIN vw_vendors_invoice_payments_summary ON vendors.vendor_id = vw_vendors_invoice_payments_summary.vendor_id) AS records_list;

vw_vendors.view_query: SELECT purchase_terms.purchase_term_name,vendors.* FROM vendors LEFT JOIN purchase_terms ON vendors.purchase_term_id = purchase_terms.purchase_term_id

vw_vendors_commercial_payments_summary.view_query: SELECT SUM(commercial_invoice_amount) AS total_commercial_amount,SUM(paid_amount) AS total_commercial_paid_amount,SUM(pending_amount) AS total_commercial_pending_amount,COUNT(commercial_invoice_id) as commercials_count,vendor_id FROM vw_purchase_commercial_invoices WHERE is_payable = 1 GROUP BY vendor_id

vw_vendors_invoice_payments_summary.view_query: SELECT SUM(invoice_amount) AS total_invoice_amount,SUM(paid_amount) AS total_invoice_paid_amount,SUM(pending_amount) AS total_invoice_pending_amount,COUNT(invoice_id) as invoices_count,vendor_id FROM vw_purchase_invoices WHERE is_payable = 1 GROUP BY vendor_id

vw_vendors_order_payments_summary.view_query: SELECT SUM(order_amount) AS total_order_amount,SUM(paid_amount) AS total_order_paid_amount,SUM(pending_amount) AS total_order_pending_amount,COUNT(order_id) as orders_count,vendor_id FROM vw_purchase_orders WHERE is_payable = 1 GROUP BY vendor_id,order_amount,order_id

vw_vendors_proforma_payments_summary.view_query: SELECT SUM(proforma_amount) AS total_proforma_amount,SUM(paid_amount) AS total_proforma_paid_amount,SUM(pending_amount) AS total_proforma_pending_amount,COUNT(proforma_id) as proformas_count,vendor_id FROM vw_purchase_proformas WHERE is_payable = 1 GROUP BY vendor_id

GET_JSON_VALUES.function_code: CREATE FUNCTION GET_JSON_VALUES(json_data TEXT) RETURNS TEXT BEGIN DECLARE result TEXT; DECLARE i INT DEFAULT 0; DECLARE json_length INT;DECLARE json_value VARCHAR(255); SET result = ''; SET json_length = JSON_LENGTH(json_data); WHILE i < json_length DO SET json_value = JSON_UNQUOTE(JSON_EXTRACT(json_data, CONCAT('\$[', i, '].value'))); SET result = CONCAT(result, json_value, ', '); SET i = i + 1; END WHILE; RETURN TRIM(TRAILING ', ' FROM result); END
